Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier police investigation at Cermak-Chinatown. Red Line service has resumed, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier police investigation at Cermak-Chinatown. Red Line service has resumed making all station stops.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
